GSD.product_version: versions from v5.5 to before v6.1.11
GSD.description:
drm/i915: Fix potential bit_17 double-free

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.1.11 by commit 0769f997a7b6d5cb8336db0b4ec3d2d311b8097c, it was introduced in version v5.5 by commit 2850748ef8763ab46958e43a4d1c445f29eeb37d. For more details please see the references link.
